Control Name: 1.5.7 Resources are reviewed weekly or bi-weekly for optimization.
Control Statement: Your under-utilized resources need to be reviewed often in order to be identified and dealt with accordingly, in addition to ensuring that your actionable recommendations are up-to-date and fully optimized. For example, Azure Advisor monitors your virtual machine (VM) usage for 7 days and then identifies low-utilization VMs.
